title: Generating optical orbital angular momentum at visible wavelengths using a plasmonic metasurface
title_cn: 使用等离子超表面产生可见波长的光学轨道角动量
abstract: Light beams with a helical phase-front possess orbital angular momentum along their direction of propagation in addition to the spin angular momentum that describes their polarisation. Until recently, it was thought that these two ‘rotational’ motions of light were largely independent and could not be coupled during light–matter interactions. However, it is now known that interactions with carefully designed complex media can result in spin-to-orbit coupling, where a change of the spin angular momentum will modify the orbital angular momentum and vice versa. In this work, we propose and demonstrate that the birefringence of plasmonic nanostructures can be wielded to transform circularly polarised light into light carrying orbital angular momentum. A device operating at visible wavelengths is designed from a space-variant array of subwavelength plasmonic nano-antennas. Experiment confirms that circularly polarised light transmitted through the device is imbued with orbital angular momentum of ±2ħ (with conversion efficiency of at least 1%). This technology paves the way towards ultrathin orbital angular momentum generators that could be integrated into applications for spectroscopy, nanoscale sensing and classical or quantum communications using integrated photonic devices.
abstract_cn: 具有螺旋相前的光束除描述其偏振的自旋角动量外，还沿其传播方向具有轨道角动量。直到最近，人们还认为这两个＆lt; rotational＆＃8217;光的运动在很大程度上是独立的，并且在光与物质的相互作用期间无法耦合。但是，现在知道与精心设计的复杂介质的相互作用会导致自旋-轨道耦合，其中自旋角动量的变化将改变轨道角动量，反之亦然。在这项工作中，我们提出并证明，可以利用等离子体纳米结构的双折射将圆偏振光转换成带有轨道角动量的光。从亚波长等离子体纳米天线的空间变化阵列设计了在可见波长下工作的设备。实验证实，通过该设备传输的圆偏振光充满了＆＃177; 2＆＃295;的轨道角动量。 （转换效率至少为1％）。该技术为超薄轨道角动量发生器铺平了道路，该发生器可以集成到光谱学，纳米级传感以及使用集成光子器件的经典或量子通信应用中。

title: Enhancing precision in fs-laser material processing by simultaneous spatial and temporal focusing
title_cn: 通过同时进行时空聚焦来提高fs激光材料加工的精度
abstract: In recent years, femtosecond (fs)-lasers have evolved into a versatile tool for high precision micromachining of transparent materials because nonlinear absorption in the focus can result in refractive index modifications or material disruptions. However, when high pulse energies or low numerical apertures are required, nonlinear side effects such as self-focusing, filamentation or white light generation can decrease the modification quality. In this paper, we apply simultaneous spatial and temporal focusing (SSTF) to overcome these limitations. The main advantage of SSTF is that the ultrashort pulse is only formed at the focal plane, thereby confining the intensity distribution strongly to the focal volume and suppressing detrimental nonlinear side effects. Thus, we investigate the optical breakdown within a water cell by pump-probe shadowgraphy, comparing conventional focusing and SSTF under equivalent focusing conditions. The plasma formation is well confined for low pulse energies <2 µJ, but higher pulse energies lead to the filamentation and break-up of the disruptions for conventional focusing, thereby decreasing the modification quality. In contrast, plasma induced by SSTF stays well confined to the focal plane, even for high pulse energies up to 8 µJ, preventing extended filaments, side branches or break-up of the disruptions. Furthermore, while conventional focusing leads to broadband supercontinuum generation, only marginal spectral broadening is observed using SSTF. These experimental findings are in excellent agreement with numerical simulations of the nonlinear pulse propagation and interaction processes. Therefore, SSTF appears to be a powerful tool to control the processing of transparent materials, e.g., for precise ophthalmic fs-surgery.
abstract_cn: 近年来，飞秒（fs）激光已发展成为用于透明材料的高精度微加工的多功能工具，因为焦点的非线性吸收会导致折射率改变或材料破裂。但是，当需要高脉冲能量或低数值孔径时，诸如自聚焦，灯丝化或白光产生之类的非线性副作用会降低修饰质量。在本文中，我们应用同时时空聚焦（SSTF）来克服这些限制。 SSTF的主要优点是仅在焦平面上形成了超短脉冲，从而将强度分布严格限制在焦距内，并抑制了有害的非线性副作用。因此，我们通过泵浦探针阴影照相法研究了水池内的光学击穿，在等效聚焦条件下比较了传统聚焦和SSTF。等离子体的形成被很好地限制在低脉冲能量＆lt; 2＆＃8197;＆＃181; J，但是较高的脉冲能量导致细丝化和常规聚焦的破坏，从而降低了修饰质量。相比之下，即使对于高达8到8 J的高脉冲能量，由SSTF诱导的等离子体也保持良好地局限在焦平面内，从而防止了延长的灯丝，侧支或破坏的破裂。此外，尽管常规聚焦导致产生宽带超连续谱，但使用SSTF只能观察到边际光谱展宽。这些实验结果与非线性脉冲传播和相互作用过程的数值模拟非常吻合。因此，SSTF似乎是控制透明材料加工的强大工具，例如用于精密眼科fs手术。

title: Tunable multiband terahertz metamaterials using a reconfigurable electric split-ring resonator array
title_cn: 使用可重构电开口环谐振器阵列的可调谐多频带太赫兹超材料
abstract: We demonstrate micromachined reconfigurable metamaterials working at multiple frequencies simultaneously in the terahertz range. The proposed metamaterial structures can be structurally reconfigured by employing flexible microelectromechanical system-based cantilevers in the resonators, which are designed to deform out of plane under an external stimulus. The proposed metamaterial structures provide not only multiband resonance frequency operation but also polarization-dependent tunability. Three kinds of metamaterials are investigated as electric split-ring resonator (eSRR) arrays with different positions of the split. By moving the position of the split away from the resonator's center, the eSRR exhibits anisotropy, with the dipole resonance splitting into two resonances. The dipole–dipole coupling strength can be continuously adjusted, which enables the electromagnetic response to be tailored by adjusting the direct current (DC) voltage between the released cantilevers and the silicon substrate. The observed tunability of the eSRRs is found to be dependent on the polarization of the incident terahertz wave. This polarization-dependent tunability is demonstrated by both experimental measurements and electromagnetic simulations.
abstract_cn: 我们演示了在太赫兹范围内同时以多种频率工作的微加工可重构超材料。所提出的超材料结构可以通过在谐振器中采用基于柔性微机电系统的悬臂在结构上进行重新配置，该悬臂设计为在外部刺激下在平面外变形。所提出的超材料结构不仅提供多频带谐振频率操作，而且提供偏振相关的可调性。研究了三种超材料，作为具有不同裂口位置的电裂环谐振器（eSRR）阵列。通过将分离的位置从谐振器的中心移开，eSRR表现出各向异性，偶极子谐振分裂为两个谐振。偶极偶极耦合强度可以连续调节，这可以通过调节释放的悬臂和硅衬底之间的直流（DC）电压来调整电磁响应。发现观测到的eSRR的可调性取决于入射的太赫兹波的极化。实验测量和电磁仿真都证明了这种与偏振有关的可调性。

title: 100 GHz silicon–organic hybrid modulator
abstract: Electro-optic modulation at frequencies of 100 GHz and beyond is important for photonic-electronic signal processing at the highest speeds. To date, however, only a small number of devices exist that can operate up to this frequency. In this study, we demonstrate that this frequency range can be addressed by nanophotonic, silicon-based modulators. We exploit the ultrafast Pockels effect by using the silicon–organic hybrid (SOH) platform, which combines highly nonlinear organic molecules with silicon waveguides. Until now, the bandwidth of these devices was limited by the losses of the radiofrequency (RF) signal and the RC (resistor-capacitor) time constant of the silicon structure. The RF losses are overcome by using a device as short as 500 µm, and the RC time constant is decreased by using a highly conductive electron accumulation layer and an improved gate insulator. Using this method, we demonstrate for the first time an integrated silicon modulator with a 3dB bandwidth at an operating frequency beyond 100 GHz. Our results clearly indicate that the RC time constant is not a fundamental speed limitation of SOH devices at these frequencies. Our device has a voltage–length product of only VπL=11 V mm, which compares favorably with the best silicon-photonic modulators available today. Using cladding materials with stronger nonlinearities, the voltage–length product is expected to improve by more than an order of magnitude.
abstract_cn: 在100＆＃8197; GHz以及更高的频率上的电光调制对于以最高速度进行光电子信号处理非常重要。但是，到目前为止，只有少数设备可以在此频率下运行。在这项研究中，我们证明了可以通过纳米光子，基于硅的调制器解决该频率范围。我们使用硅有机混合（SOH）平台开发了超快的普克尔斯效应，该平台将高度非线性的有机分子与硅波导相结合。到目前为止，这些器件的带宽受到射频（RF）信号的损失和硅结构的RC（电阻-电容）时间常数的限制。通过使用短至500μm的器件可以克服RF损耗，并通过使用高导电性的电子累积层和改进的栅极绝缘体来降低RC时间常数。使用这种方法，我们首次展示了在工作频率超过100＆＃8197 GHz时具有3dB带宽的集成硅调制器。我们的结果清楚地表明，在这些频率下，RC时间常数不是SOH器件的基本速度限制。我们的设备的电压长度乘积仅为V ＆＃960; L = 11＆＃8197; V mm，与当今可用的最佳硅光子调制器相媲美。使用具有更强非线性的覆层材料，电压长度乘积有望提高超过一个数量级。

title: Optical storage arrays: a perspective for future big data storage
title_cn: 光学存储阵列：未来大数据存储的前景
abstract: The advance of nanophotonics has provided a variety of avenues for light–matter interaction at the nanometer scale through the enriched mechanisms for physical and chemical reactions induced by nanometer-confined optical probes in nanocomposite materials. These emerging nanophotonic devices and materials have enabled researchers to develop disruptive methods of tremendously increasing the storage capacity of current optical memory. In this paper, we present a review of the recent advancements in nanophotonics-enabled optical storage techniques. Particularly, we offer our perspective of using them as optical storage arrays for next-generation exabyte data centers.
abstract_cn: 纳米光子学的发展通过纳米复合材料中纳米受限光学探针引起的物理和化学反应的丰富机理，为纳米级光与物质的相互作用提供了多种途径。 这些新兴的纳米光子器件和材料使研究人员能够开发出破坏性方法，从而极大地提高当前光学存储器的存储容量。 在本文中，我们介绍了纳米光子技术的光学存储技术的最新进展。 特别是，我们提供了将其用作下一代EB级数据中心的光存储阵列的观点。
